LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.label: 嗜血部族
LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.description: Your group narrowly escaped a corrupt and abusive village. Only a few of you got out and are planning on never going back. You are hungry and cold and have decided that after all this, it was time to settle down.\n\nYou will play for norbal race.
LanguageData.BloodthirstyTribe.scenario.name: 嗜血部族
